title: Tasty Chicken ( Using Leftover ) Salad Sandwich Recipe
content:
A delicious creamy salad which taste so delicious. This chicken salad is easy to make and makes a great filling for sandwiches too. It tastes so yummy cold so it is perfect for summer.

If you have leftover chicken lying around then this is a delicious salad to make. It is great to put in a lunch box too. You can serve it with some bread slices or some dinner rolls and you have a yummy lunch.

 

Chicken Salad Sandwich Recipe

Prep time: 10 mins

Total time: 10 mins

 

Recipe type: Main

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 3 to 4 sandwich

 

Ingredients

Leftover Chicken - 2 cups shredded

Mayonnaise - ¼ cup or as needed

Cabbage - ¼ cup sliced thinly

Carrot - ¼ cup sliced thinly

Onion - ½ sliced thinly

Coriander Leaves - 3 Tablespoons chopped finely

Salt to taste

Pepper to taste

 

Instructions

Mix everything together except buns.

Spoon into slit burger buns or bread slices.

Cover it and serve.

recommendations.title: Tasty Quick Stir Fry Rice with Chicken
recommendations.content:
Super easy and quick to make stir fry rice for kids. This recipe can be made using leftover cooked rice and chicken. A great recipe to put in kids lunch box.

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
